name: bb-tournament-api
description: API schema for BridgeBuddy tournament server
author: Noah Hummel <hummel@marvelous.systems>

scripts.lint-apis: for i in $(ls schema/*.yaml); do speccy lint -j -s operation-tags -s openapi-tags $i; done
scripts.bundle-apis: yarn run cleanup-apis && for i in $(ls schema/*.yaml); do speccy resolve -j $i -o "${i%.yaml}.bundle.yaml"; done
scripts.bundle-types: yarn run quicktype schema/ --lang js --out types.js
scripts.build: yarn run lint-apis && yarn run bundle-apis && yarn run bundle-types
